title: Pixel 4a proximity sensor works, screen doesn't go off during a call or when I shut my phone case
content:
So far, I ran the AndroSensor app to see if the proximity sensor works. It shows 0.0 if I wave my hand over the front camera area and 2.0 in otherwise, so that seems to work just fine.

However, if I make a call or place my hand over the camera area of the phone or close my phone case, the screen doesn't turn off. 

I have started the phone in safe mode, and it shows the same problem.

Thanks for any help.
